#include <iostream>
#include <vector> 
using namespace std;

#define INF 1LL<<60LL

long long ab(long long a,long long b) {
    return a-b>0?a-b : b-a;
}

int main() {
	int n;

	cin>>n;
	
	vector <long long> a(n);
	vector <long long> dp(n,INF);
	
	for(int i=0;i<n;i++)
	    cin>>a[i];
	dp[0] = 0;
	for(int i=1;i<n;i++) {
	   
	    for(int j = 1; i-j >= 0; j <<= 1) {
	        dp[i] = min(dp[i], dp[i-j] + ab(a[i],a[i-j]));
	        
	    }    
//	cout<<dp[i]<<endl;
	}
	cout<<dp[n-1];
	return 0;
}
